name: Doinky Joe's Funky Land
description:
Hey everyone! Welcome to Doinky Joe's Funky Land! This is a small game that I created in celebration for my Discord server reaching over 50 members! I asked the community for ideas, and oh boy, they delivered! I hope you all enjoy this small, bizarre game. 

This game can be played with both mouse/keyboard and controller.

Thank you to my Discord community for all the fun ideas. I had a blast and this game is dedicated to all of you! Enjoy!

On that note, to those of you that aren't a member of the community, feel free to join my Discord!
